EmailTemplate.subject: Reducing Indirect Spends (1561577278.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Rocky,
We are interested in partnering with Walker Industries and have helped many organizations reduce their costs.
How are you currently managing your indirect spends and opex?
If you are interested in having a brief conversation about how we can help, please let me know when is the best time to reach you.
For a quick view of the types of products & services we offer see the link to our website below.
https://www.grandandtoy.com/ <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/]]>
Best regards,
Liz Rust Business Development Manager, Central Canada 200 Aviva Park Dr, Vaughan, ON L4L 9C7 E-mail: elizabethrust@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:elizabethrust@grandandtoy.com]]> | Cell: 365-778-8250 Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology
